sources.title: Articles on Smashing Magazine ‚Äî For Web Designers And Developers

articles.author: hello@smashingmagazine.com (William Juan)
articles.description: If you‚Äôre considering learning Angular, this article sums up what William Juan wished he knew when he started, including the mistakes made and lessons learned the hard way.
articles.title: Things I Wish I Had Known About Angular When I Started

articles.author: hello@smashingmagazine.com (Vitaly Friedman)
articles.description: Inline validation in web forms is useful when it works, but frustrating when it fails. Too often it leads to an endless stream of disruptive error messages or dead-ends without any chance of getting out. Let‚Äôs fix it.
articles.title: Designing Better Inline Validation UX

articles.author: hello@smashingmagazine.com (Drew McLellan)
articles.description: In this episode of the Smashing Podcast, we‚Äôre talking about HTML email. Do we still have to design like we would for IE5? Vitaly talks to expert R√©mi Parmentier to find out.
articles.title: Smashing Podcast Episode 53 With R√©mi Parmentier: Can HTML Email Use Modern CSS?

articles.author: hello@smashingmagazine.com (Paul Scanlon)
articles.description: Gatsby has evolved quite dramatically in the last two years. In this article, Paul Scanlon explains what Gatsby can do today, and how he used some of the new features when upgrading his personal website from Gatsby 2 to Gatsby 4.
articles.title: What‚Äôs New In Gatsby 2022?

articles.author: hello@smashingmagazine.com (Andrico Karoulla)
articles.description: In today‚Äôs article, Andrico Karoulla explains how to create a cool draggable effect by listening to the drag events and writing some custom logic inside the handlers.
articles.title: Building A Retro Draggable Web Component With Lit

articles.author: hello@smashingmagazine.com (Matt Athanasiou)
articles.description: How can companies change their rating and review systems to better benefit users? Matt Athanasiou shares some steps to improve the experience of reviewing literature and other products ‚Äî while also building stronger connections.
articles.title: Rethinking Star Ratings For Readers

articles.author: hello@smashingmagazine.com (Josefine Schaefer)
articles.description: Do you want to make your new website as accessible as possible? Amazing, that‚Äôs a great mindset! Let‚Äôs have a closer look at the factors you should take into consideration when choosing a content management system (CMS) in terms of web accessibility.
articles.title: Headless In Times Of Accessibility

articles.author: hello@smashingmagazine.com (Juan Diego Rodr√≠guez)
articles.description: In this article, Juan Diego covers the least known yet extremely useful APIs, such as the Page Visibility API, Web Sharing API, Broadcast Channel API and Internationalization API. Together we will see what they are, where we should use them, and how to use them.
articles.title: JavaScript APIs You Don‚Äôt Know About

articles.author: hello@smashingmagazine.com (Kate Kalcevich)
articles.description: In this article, Kate Kalcevich explains when to use ARIA and how to use it properly so that you can use ARIA in a way that‚Äôs helpful to the many disabled people who use [assistive technology](https://makeitfable.com/glossary/?utm_source=Smashing+Magazine&utm_medium=sponsored+content&utm_campaign=Upskill&utm_term=Fable&utm_content=Sept2022) to navigate the Internet. Let‚Äôs dive in!

articles.title: Meet ‚ÄúSmart Interface Design Patterns Checklists‚Äù (Deck With 166 Cards)

articles.description: Design systems are a crucial success factor for digital businesses, and virtually every major player works with one. Still, they can sometimes be hard to sell to management. Here‚Äôs a ready-to-use formula to calculate the ROI of any design system.
articles.title: One Formula To Rule Them All: The ROI Of A Design System

articles.author: hello@smashingmagazine.com (Vitaly Friedman)

articles.title: UX Checklists For Interface Designers

articles.title: The Realities And Myths Of Contrast And Color

articles.author: hello@smashingmagazine.com (Drew McLellan)
articles.description: In this episode of the Smashing Podcast, we ask how do you go from running a creative studio to designing NFTs. Vitaly talks to artist Yiying Lu to find out.
articles.title: Smashing Podcast Episode 52 With Yiying Lu: How Do You Become An NFT Artist?

articles.author: hello@smashingmagazine.com (Vitaly Friedman)
articles.description: Meet ‚ÄúUnderstanding Privacy‚Äù, our upcoming book on what data privacy is really about beyond scary headlines. Approx. 350 pages. eBook available in October, print shipping in November.
articles.title: Meet Understanding Privacy, A New Smashing Book By Heather Burns
